testcase.name: Cart button
testcase.system-out: Given User is navigated to Home page........................................passed Then Click each tab on yellow banner. User should navigate to the Cart page after clicking the Cart icon button.passed

testcase.name: Changing quantity of product in the Cart
testcase.system-out: Given Click the category tab................................................passed When Click the chosen product and click Add to cart button..................passed And Click Cart Icon button..................................................passed Then Verify User able to change the quantity of product in the Cart.........passed

testcase.name: Go shopping button
testcase.system-out: Given Click Cart Icon button................................................passed When User should be able to see and click Go Shopping button................passed Then User is navigated to Home page.........................................passed
